          <title>

            <string language="en">If I was ... an animal</string>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Si j'étais... un animal</string>

          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Reševalec si zamisli, da je žival in jo opiše s pomočjo danih nalog. Dodatne zabavne naloge.</string>
            <string language="en">Exploring animals by taking over the identity of an animal.</string>
